item.title: Civo Commands
item.description: Civo: Setup and Teardown Some civo aliases kubernetes = k3s, k8s, kube applications = apps, addons, marketplace save = save, add, store, create, new ecom = the name of the cluster ecom = the name of the kubernetes namespace used Set up Civo api key (done once) Get API key from civo Dashboard > login at https://dashboard.civo.com/ On laptop brew install civo civo apikey add my-civo DAb75.. civo apikey ls (confirm)
